entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Issue with Control.FromHandle not recognizing Label in WinForms #100730
  • [API Proposal]: string.{Last}IndexOfAny(string[]) #100724
  • Wasm test timeout: Process ... didn't exit within 00:30:00 and will be killed #100721
  • Misleading exception for ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory #100720

Closed

  • I am COM and I must Release() (in ComWrappers) #100645
  • error CS0121 when trying to publish outside of Visual Studio (building in VS works fine) #100727
  • Valgrind reports "conflicting stores" problem in aot eventpipe implementation #100627
  • WinDbg doesn't break on first chance managed exceptions with the new EH enabled #100701
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RuntimeHelpers.Box to create a box around a dynamically-typed byref #97341
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT/x86] Fix funclet unwinding #100732
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add FreeBSD-specific logic to pal::get_default_installation_dir_for_arch #100731
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Mark some fields readonly or const #100728
    area-Meta
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement ConditionalSelect API #100718
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Streamline Guid.NewGuid on Windows #100719
    needs-area-label
  • Fix contract and remove unused method overload #100722
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix WinDbg first chance exception notification #100714
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Re-enable Runtime_56953 on arm/arm64 #100717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Saturating floating point to integer conversions on Arm32 #100682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix official build: disable compile-native runtime component libraries for linux-bionic #100712
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix KeyInfoX509Data encoding negative serial numbers #100713
    area-System.Security
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Simplify description of the SList data structure #100107
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exclude unhandledTester test on native AOT #100574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify jitconfigvalues.h #100704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [mono][interp] Minor fixes #100661
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-06
entry.content:

Updated

    Any Time

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected nullability warning is reported for erroneous conditional assignment #72912
  • `GetPreprocessingSymbolInfo` returns info when inside `#pragma warning` directive #72907
  • Possibly unexpected behavior of nullable analysis around dynamic operators. #72906
  • Result of >> and >>> operator for native integer constants should be platform-dependent if the shiftAmount has 0x20 (32) set #72904
  • Compiler conversion crash with collectoin exprs. #72898

Closed

  • CSC Compiler Crash in VS 17.9.5 (likely related to collection expressions) #72903
  • string.Concat behavior difference in recent preview #72883

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to using index operator #72911
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix returning valid pp symbol info on unrelated preprocessor directives #72910
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pin solutions when doing fix all operation #72909
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve asset hints to speed up searching #72902
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify code using SyntaxFactory. #72901
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move IDE off of SpecializedCollections.Singleton to using collectoin exprs #72899
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ISyntaxFacts from snippet work #72897
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement lambda params with modifiers without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext, updates #54994
  • Perf improvement: caching, endpoint #54993
  • Display value correctly in Razor View after Model Binding #54995
  • Blazor Server 8 Advanced Navigation Font Awesome icons oversized #54990
  • Binding ViewModel params with incorrect keys #54989

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #54961
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54991
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #54981
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54960
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #54980

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix code tags in docs #54987
    area-security

Merged

  • Fix static analysis HRESULT / bool conversion warnings #54988
    area-networking, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Improve documentation for CookiePolicyMiddleware and CookieOptions #54968
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Use JSON source generator during WebAssembly startup #54956
    area-blazor
  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Image on button not scaling down for all scenarios when dimensions are less than button #21683
    .NET 8 SR4
  • HideSoftInputOnTapped only works when ContentPage is in AppShell? #21681
  • MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #21675
  • Make it easier to write a custom ToolbarHandler #21674

Closed

  • DropGestureRecognier.Drop Event is not Triggered #20153
  • CarouselView does not render correctly on orientation change #21401
    Backlog
  • App icon cannot be changed on iOS #21603
  • [Windows] Images should not cover text if they're too big inside a button #21513
    .NET 8 SR4
  • After rotating the emulator from horizontal to vertical orientation, the card of page My Recipes is truncated. #21609
    .NET 8 SR4

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Flyout IsGestureEnabled fix #21686
    community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Allow drag item from outside the app #21684
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨

Merged

  • [WinUI] Allocate less when updating gestures #21450
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • BindableObject System.NullReferenceException when bindings queue gets messed up #21523
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21667
  • Update bug-report.yml to add 8.0.14 and 9.0.0-preview.2.10293 #21676
    community ✨
  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.40 #21673
  • Update GitInfo.txt 8.0.20-preview #21672
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Set Views used for CarouselView to Match Parent #21662

Updated

  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [net9.0] Merge net9.0 to main #21666
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: improve identifier validation so that we don't throw exception for "insufficient identifiers" when there is only one collection in the projection #33485
  • Debug output that indexer properties are created in shadow state is incorrect #33484
  • Compiled model performance trends #33483
  • AOT: properly deal with NetTopologySuite objects in the materializer for AOT scenarios #33482

PullRequests

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
